project.description: DO NOT EDIT. THIS JOB IS GENERATED.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -x
#stop on error set -o errexit
sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install python-jenkins python-catkin-pkg -y python-rospkg
rm -rf catkin-debs git clone git://github.com/willowgarage/catkin-debs.git -b master
export PYTHONPATH=$WORKSPACE/catkin-debs $WORKSPACE/catkin-debs/scripts/generate_status_page.py fuerte --basedir $WORKSPACE/fuerte_apt_cache
scp -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no $WORKSPACE/fuerte_apt_cache/fuerte.* wgs32:/var/www/www.ros.org/html/debbuild/
